segments.text: I observe the angled view of the kitchen interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet running and water overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinet doors are open revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a two-step stool, reaching inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears tilted and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate with his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm raised toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden path and bushes look neat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This setup shows routine activity with hidden issues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the combination of overflow and climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene balances calm outside with activity inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
